Cedric Jamie Soh, Director at Seniorcare.com.sgTop Contributor (Sep)Level 7. Grand MasterAnswered on 16 Sep 2019I placed a small amount of my "war chest" (money I saved as to be more liquid to buy stocks when a big market correction arrives) in them for 5% pa.
https://timelyenterprise.com.sg/better-returns-than-singapore-saving-bonds-similar-risks/
to reduce misunderstanding, I will not be seeking any referral fees (if you read the blog post, you know what I mean).  I placed because I want a slightly higher return and I want the money to be readily available within 3 months.Just read the post and do your own due diligence0 comments1
